sentences: Wouter Hamel (born 1977) is a Dutch Pop singer.
He released his debut album Hamel in March 2007.
After winning the Dutch Jazz Vocal Competition in 2005, Hamel received significant attention from the Dutch media.
Hamel also released the song "Breezy" as a single in Japan, where it reached #36 on the Tokio Hot 100 chart.
In 2011, Hamel released his third album Lohengrin and also supported Caro Emerald on her tour in Germany.
